column.name: SQSM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“项目承揽及立项阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起立项书面审核流程。<font>'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: CLJLXJDSCBL
column.describe: 承揽及立项阶段上传比例
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("CLJLXJDSCBL").setLabel("底稿系统项目承揽及立项阶段上传比例");

column.name: SFCRHXGLZR
column.describe: 是否承担后续管理责任

column.name: FXRSFWSSGS
column.describe: 发行人是否为上市公司

column.name: FXRMGSSFWSSGS
column.describe: 发行人母公司是否为上市公司

column.name: SFWCLYCTJC
column.describe: 是否完成利益冲突核查

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User.ID;
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="  打包下载  " />'

column.name: SFYYJ
column.describe: 质控主副审是否有意见
column.comment: 12节点质控主副审是否有意见。0|否；1|是
